        <title>Neighborhood Conervation Area's Buffer, Arlington County, VA</title>

        <onlink>\\GIS-VISITOR\C$\Documents and Settings\VISITOR\Desktop\Arlington_2004\NCA_Buffer.shp</onlink>

</citeinfo>
    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This polygon layer represents  buffered border areas of Neiighorhood Conservation Area's (NCA’s).</abstract>
      <purpose>
    The Neighborhood Conservation Area geodatabase consists of three feature
    classes, NCA_ARC, NCA_POLY and NCA_BUFFER. The NCA feature classes
    delineate the areas of Arlington County where a conservation area have been
    defined, and denotes those with County-approved conservation plans.
    Annotation identifies the areas by name. The NCA_BUFFER feature class also
    shows the conservation areas, but uses a “buffered” line, or a band of color (or
    fill pattern) inside the perimeter.
   </purpose>
    </descript>
